name: postcss-conditionals-renewed

1.0.0.name: postcss-conditionals-renewed
1.0.0.description: PostCSS plugin that enables @if statements in your CSS

scripts.build: del-cli dist && cross-env BABEL_ENV=publish babel src --out-dir dist && jison parser.jison -o dist/lib/parser.js
